overview.textConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?

edit.salesChannelHelpText: Which sales channel to be used
edit.publicKeyHelpText: Find your public key in the API Key Management section in EffectConnect.
edit.secretKeyHelpText: Find your secret key in the API Key Management section in EffectConnect.
edit.scheduleHelpText: Determines if and when the process will run.
edit.addLeadingZeroToEanHelpText: Select whether the plugin should automatically add a leading zero to an EAN that consists of 12 characters.
edit.useSpecialPriceHelpText: Select whether the special price attribute should be used when exporting the catalog to EffectConnect. The original price will just as well be exported, but in that case as original price attribute.
edit.useFallbackTranslationsHelpText: Select whether the default language should be used when a translatable value is not set in one of the other languages when exporting the catalog to EffectConnect.
edit.useSalesChannelDefaultLanguageAsFirstFal: Use sales channel default language as first fallback language
By default the default language of the system languages is used as fallback language. When enabled, the sales channel default language will be used as fallback language first.
edit.useSystemLanguagesHelpText: By default the defined languages in the sales channel will be used. When enabled, the system languages will be used when exporting the catalog to EffectConnect.
edit.stockTypeHelpText: Determines which stock to use when building the exports.
edit.paymentStatusHelpText: Select the payment status for imported orders.
edit.orderStatusHelpText: Select the order status for imported orders.
edit.paymentMethodHelpText: Select the payment method for imported orders.
edit.shippingMethodHelpText: Select the shipment method for imported orders.
